biotools.summary: This software is a tool to predict functional composition of microbial communities based on communities survey data which builds a pangenome for each OTU and assigns the pangenome’s functional profile to the OTU.

bioschemas.name: PanFP
bioschemas.summary: This software is a tool to predict functional composition of microbial communities based on communities survey data which builds a pangenome for each OTU and assigns the pangenome’s functional profile to the OTU.
